title: Typeface identification please
content:
Could u please identify these two typefaces ?  
thx a lot

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [1.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017053021/http:/typophile.com/files/1_24.png) | 141.36 KB |
| [2.png](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017053021/http:/typophile.com/files/2_15.png) | 28.78 KB |
author: wonderfulgreg

comments.content:
1. = [Big Caslon](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017053021/http:/www.identifont.com/show?8LT) by Matt Carter.

2. = [Estilo](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017053021/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/dstype/estilo/) by Dino dos Santos.
